Class GameView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  GameView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GameView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener

HW10: DAFTMAN I worked on this assignment alone, using course materials, previous work, the online Java API. GameView.java This class manages and displays a grid of tiles and a number of sprite objects to make up the actual game part of this application. Also manages the score and scoreboard. Everything runs off of a single timer.

Version:
1.0 12/03/2010
Author:
Ryan Ashcraft
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

GameView

public GameView(java.awt.Dimension aDimension,
                int aScore,
                int aLevel,
                int aHealth,
                GameViewDelegate aDelegate)
Constructor for GameView objects that chains to another constructor, sending null for the string array to fille. Essentially, if this constructor is called, a level will be randomly generated

Parameters:
aDimension - The size of this view
aScore - The score to start with
aLevel - The level being played
aHealth - The health to start with
aDelegate - The GameViewDelegate object

GameView

public GameView(java.awt.Dimension aDimension,
                java.lang.String[] stringArray,
                int aScore,
                int aLevel,
                int aHealth,
                GameViewDelegate aDelegate)
Constructor for GameView objects that creates all the tiles, sets all the starting parameters, starts the timer. If stringArray is not null, fills the board with tiles and sprites defined by those strings. If it is null, a random level will be generated.

Parameters:
aDimension - The size of the view
stringArray - The string array to fill the board
aScore - The score to start with
aLevel - The level being played
aHealth - The health to start with
aDelegate - The GameViewDelegate object

act

public void act()
Called when timer fires and tells each sprite to do something. Calls to check collisions on all moving sprites (bro and foes), and checks to see if game should end. Also sets the scoreboard's values.

rupeesLeft

public int rupeesLeft()
Returns the number of rupees left to collect.

Returns:
The number of rupees left.

Pauses the game and mutes sound effects.

autoCorrectedPoint

public java.awt.Point autoCorrectedPoint(java.awt.Point aPoint,
                                         MovingSprite sprite)
Returns the corrected point for the MovingSprite to move to, based off of the point it wants to move to after it tries to move.

Parameters:
aPoint - The point the MovingSprite wants to move to
sprite - The MovingSprite that is moving
Returns:
The corrected point

placeBomb

public void placeBomb()
Places a bomb at the tile the bro is at and plays a sonud effect.

didExplode

public void didExplode()
Places fires at tile where bomb exploded and tiles within a horizontal/vertical range of the explosion. The fires stop when they hit an impassable wall or go outside the range. Plays a sound effect.

playSound

public void playSound(java.lang.String filename)
Plays a WAV sound.

Parameters:
filename - The file name of the WAV sound

stopFire

public void stopFire(Fire aFire)
Removes the fire.

Parameters:
aFire - The fire

checkCollisions

public void checkCollisions(MovingSprite sprite)
Checks to see if a sprite intersects with any other sprites. Performs an action based off of the type of sprite the tested sprite intersects with.

Parameters:
sprite - The sprite being tested

hurt

public void hurt(MovingSprite sprite)
Hurts the moving sprite and plays a sound effect.

Parameters:
sprite - The sprite to hurt

Adds to score the rupee's value and removes the rupee from the board. Plays a sound effect.

Parameters:
aRupee - The rupee to collect
